text: Emir Can İğrek (born 2 April 1993, Çerkezköy) is a Turkish singer and songwriter. He started making music by setting up small stage groups in the city where he was born. In 2019, he had his breakthrough with the song "Nalan". At the 2020 PowerTürk Music Awards, he was awarded as the "Most Powerful Newcomer of the Year". He has also composed songs for artists such as Funda Arar and Ferhat Göçer. As of 2020, he is studying at Yıldız Technical University. == Discography == ;Albums * Ağır Roman (2018) ;Singles * "Gönül Davası" (2017) * "Aç Bağrını" (2018) * "Defoluyorum" (2019) * "Gömleğimin Cebi" (2019) * "Dönsen Bile" (2019) * "Nevale" (2019) * "Nalan" (2019) * "Silahım Yok" (2019) * "Sapa" (2020) * "Meydan" (2020) * "Darbe" (ft. Patron) (2020) * "Saman Sarısı" (2020) * "Dargın" (with Zeynep Bastık) (2020) == Awards == * Most Powerful Newcomer Singer in 2019, PowerTürk Music Awards * Most Admired Male Singer in 2019, Altınyıldız Classics Stars of the Year Awards (YTU) == References == Category:1993 births Category:Turkish male singers Category:Turkish composers Category:Yıldız Technical University alumni Category:Living people Category:Turkish lyricists
title: Emir Can İğrek
